survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards sustainable packaging in the food and beverage industry.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when purchasing food or beverages?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when purchasing food or beverages?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other sustainable packaging materials you prefer.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture additional materials not listed. Keep the field concise.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text (only visible if 'Other' is selected in Q2).

script.question_text: Please specify any other sustainable packaging materials you prefer.

questions.question_text: How much more would you be willing to pay for a product with sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge price sensitivity. Ensure options are clear and cover a reasonable range.

script.question_text: How much more would you be willing to pay for a product with sustainable packaging?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question to prioritize factors. Ensure the interface allows easy drag-and-drop or numerical input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Ranking (custom script for drag-and-drop or numerical input).

script.question_text: Which of the following factors influence your preference for sustainable packaging? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)

questions.question_text: Have you ever avoided purchasing a product because of its non-sustainable packaging?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to measure behavioral impact.

script.question_text: Have you ever avoided purchasing a product because of its non-sustainable packaging?

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific instances where you avoided a product due to non-sustainable packaging.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Keep the response field sufficiently large.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text (only visible if 'Yes' is selected in Q6).

script.question_text: Please describe any specific instances where you avoided a product due to non-sustainable packaging.

questions.question_text: How do you typically dispose of sustainable packaging? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand disposal behaviors. Include an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes (multi-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you typically dispose of sustainable packaging? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other ways you dispose of sustainable packaging.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unique disposal methods. Keep the field concise.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text (only visible if 'Other' is selected in Q8).

script.question_text: Please specify any other ways you dispose of sustainable packaging.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of sustainable packaging options in stores?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of sustainable packaging options in stores?
